title: Java Interview Preparation
subject: Java
theory:
Consolidated list of critical topics for cracking interviews.

1.  String vs StringBuffer.
2.  HashMap internal working (Collision, LinkedList/RedBlackTree).
3.  Abstract vs Interface.
4.  Wait vs Sleep.
5.  Equals vs HashCode contract.

common_mistakes.correction: If you override equals, you MUST override hashCode. Otherwise Maps break.

interview_questions.question: How does HashMap work?
interview_questions.answer: Uses hashing of keys. Resolves collisions using Chaining (LinkedList) -> converts to Balanced Tree in Java 8+ if chain > 8.

real_world_use_cases.description: FAANG interviews focus heavily on Concurrency and Collections.

exam_notes: Know time complexity of Collection operations.
